section.title: Description
section.p: Need to model Residence Type (US Citizen, Resident Alien, etc.)
Note: this should link to either an Agent or the Provider (in an exclusive OR), but since we don't instantiate those, we'll just stope here

Insured-Or-Member is synonymous for Member, Beneficiary, Recipient, and Covered Person. In other words, this person is the patient. But, not all Insured-Or-Members are necessarily ever patients, only those that have actually been treated are. Note that the Insured-Or-Member may be a 'dependent', or may be the subscriber (i.e., 'self')
Need to revisit This class may not be in the right place in the model CMS attribute needs to move
Enrollment, Eligibility, and Coordination of Benefits&amp;nbsp;Domain
Subscriber, PolicyHolder, and Contract Holder are synonymous
